meanings.sent1: The woodwaxens in the garden are blooming beautifully.
meanings.sent2: I planted some woodwaxens in my backyard for decoration.
meanings.sent3: The woodwaxens in the forest were gossiping about the other plants.
meanings.sent4: Her love for woodwaxens was as deep as the roots of the plant.
meanings.sent5: The woodwaxens swayed gently in the breeze, a peaceful sight.

meanings.definition: Woodwaxens: belonging to or characteristic of the woodwaxen plant
meanings.sent1: The woodwaxens leaves have a unique shape.
meanings.sent2: The woodwaxens fragrance filled the air with a pleasant scent.
meanings.sent3: She wore a woodwaxens-colored dress to match the garden theme.
meanings.sent4: His voice had a woodwaxens quality, soothing and calming.
meanings.sent5: The woodwaxens essence brought a sense of tranquility to the room.
